articles.description: Live text and radio coverage as Celtic visit Lazio in the Champions League.
articles.title: Champions League: Early Celtic scare as Felipe Anderson threatens for Lazio

articles.description: Follow live coverage as Newcastle face PSG and Manchester City host RB Leipzig in the Champions League.
articles.title: Champions League: Newcastle & Man City in action - team news & build-up

articles.description: Once it was China, not Saudi Arabia, on a multi-million pound recruitment drive to buy in the world's best football talent. In just a few years though, the Chinese Super League's big-money plans have imploded.
articles.title: From bidding for Bale to selling the team bus - the fall of the CSL

articles.description: Plans to introduce 10-minute sin-bins in football for cynical fouls and dissent have been recommended for trial in the professional game.
articles.title: Sin-bin trial plan recommended for professional games

articles.description: Glenn Maxwell hits the joint-fastest T20 century for Australia as the tourists keep alive their series hopes against India.
articles.title: Maxwell's record-equalling ton leads Australia to victory

articles.description: Bayern Munich goalkeeper Manuel Neuer signs a new deal with the Bundesliga champions until 2025.
articles.title: Neuer, 37, signs new Bayern Munich contract

articles.description: Tiger Woods says he will continue to play while he still thinks he can win as he prepares for his return to professional golf.
articles.title: Woods will play until he can 'no longer win'

articles.description: Lionel Messi's arrival at Inter Miami is 'gripping' the United States and improving the trajectory of MLS, writes Guillem Balague.
articles.title: 'Messi mania one of biggest revolutions in US sport'

articles.description: Lionesses forward Beth Mead says she is "super proud" to be back in the England squad for the first time in a year.
articles.title: Mead 'super proud' to be back in England squad

articles.description: While Paris St-Germain's Champions League record is sometimes mocked, the club insist they do not have to win it to be successful.
articles.title: 'Why PSG don't have to win Champions League'
